question: Greetings to you Imam. I wish to know whether it is permitted to draw faces?
answer:
QUESTION
If there is an outline of a drawing (faces/animals faces)and you go over the outline, is it permitted?
ANSWER


Share:
We have not come across any specific ruling in this matter. Thus, the safest
would be to regard such drawings as Haraam, as is the position with the
drawings of all animate objects.

However, if the head is totally removed, such drawings will be permissible.
(Mirqaat vol. 8 pg.334)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
